name: CQ.Ext.data.Tree
doc:
Represents a tree data structure and bubbles all the events for its nodes. The nodes
in the tree ...

configs.name: pathSeparator
configs.doc: The token used to separate paths in node ids (defaults to '/').

props.name: root
props.doc: The root node for this tree

methods.name: enableBubble
methods.doc:
Enables events fired by this Observable to bubble up an owner hierarchy by calling
this.getBubble...

methods.name: getNodeById
methods.doc: Gets a node in this tree by its id.

methods.name: getRootNode
methods.doc: Returns the root node for this tree.

methods.name: relayEvents
methods.doc: Relays selected events from the specified Observable as if the events were fired by this.

methods.name: setRootNode
methods.doc: Sets the root node for this tree.

events.name: append
events.doc: Fires when a new child node is appended to a node in this tree.

events.name: beforeappend
events.doc: Fires before a new child is appended to a node in this tree, return false to cancel the append.

events.name: beforeinsert
events.doc: Fires before a new child is inserted in a node in this tree, return false to cancel the insert.

events.name: beforemove
events.doc: Fires before a node is moved to a new location in the tree. Return false to cancel the move.

events.name: beforeremove
events.doc: Fires before a child is removed from a node in this tree, return false to cancel the remove.

events.name: insert
events.doc: Fires when a new child node is inserted in a node in this tree.

events.name: move
events.doc: Fires when a node is moved to a new location in the tree

events.name: remove
events.doc: Fires when a child node is removed from a node in this tree.
